title: Partner Communications Manager - Monobrand, Greater China Marcom Channel
summary: Every day millions of consumers around the world interact with Apple and its products in the Indirect Channel through mobile, digital and in-store experiences. The Indirect Channel plays a hugely important role for Apple, with Marcom Channel driving strategies to provide customers a thoughtful, engaging and seamless experience.
description: The primary responsibility of this role is to work with Monobrand partners and the Sales organization within GC, focusing on the planning and deployment of world-class merchandising and communication programs supporting Apple’s most important products. You will ensure  strong  planning  and  execution of marketing initiatives supporting  Apple’s  new  product  introduction  and seasonal campaigns along with Apple’s worldwide product merchandising priorities.
key_qualifications: Extensive brand/marketing communications experience ideally from leading consumer electronics or telecoms manufacturers, or affiliate marketing agencies.
preferred_qualifications: Experience working with and influencing at a senior level. Extensive retail experience within the applicable local market. Experience working within a global marketing organisation is a must, ideally having worked in a Geo/Field role.
